task.en: This pie chart is beautiful. Copy it as a PDF, then save the copied PDF as a PNG in Documents with the default settings, named "BeautifulChart.png".
task.zh: 这个pie chart很精美。帮我以pdf形式拷贝，然后把拷贝的pdf以png形式、默认设置保存到Documents，文件名叫BeautifulChart.png。
task.ar: هذا المخطط الدائري جميل للغاية. انسخه كملف PDF، ثم قم بحفظ ملف PDF المنسوخ كملف PNG في Documents بالإعدادات الافتراضية، وقم بتسميته "BeautifulChart.png".
task.ja: この円グラフはとても美しいです。PDFとしてコピーし、コピーしたPDFをPNG形式で、Documentsにデフォルト設定で保存してください。ファイル名は"BeautifulChart.png"です。
task.ru: Этот круговой график очень красив. Скопируйте его как PDF, затем сохраните скопированный PDF как PNG в Documents с настройками по умолчанию, назвав "BeautifulChart.png".

pre_command.en: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to make new document with properties {document template:template "Personal Budget"}'
pre_command.zh: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to make new document with properties {document template:template "个人预算"}'
pre_command.ar: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to make new document with properties {document template:template "الميزانية الشخصية"}'
pre_command.ja: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to make new document with properties {document template:template "家計簿"}'
pre_command.ru: osascript -e 'tell application "Pages" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Keynote" to quit without saving' && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to activate' && sleep 5 && osascript -e 'tell application "Numbers" to make new document with properties {document template:template "Личный бюджет"}'

grading_command: mdls -name kMDItemPixelHeight BeautifulChart.png | grep -q 264 && mdls -name kMDItemPixelWidth BeautifulChart.png | grep -q 259 && echo "True" || echo "False"
